reviewText: Hunter's Raid was a terrific documentary.  I thought It was educational and fun to watch.  The reenactors/ extras were incredible.  Great story telling.

Recently saw the video on local public TV.  The video was very informational.  I live within an hour of Lynchburg and never was aware of this battle.  Cinematography is awesome.  The film was filmed locally and extras were locals who "volunteered" to help with the movie.  This is a must see.
A wonderfully complete story illustrating a pivotal moment in Central Virginia's history. A must see for anyone interested in Hunters Raid during the War Between the States. Great
